sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; const WalmartRewardsApp = () => { const [activeModal, setActiveModal] = useState(null); const [selectedConversion, setSelectedConversion] = useState(null); const [conversionAmount, setConversionAmount] = useState(''); const [currentPoints, setCurrentPoints] = useState(23450); const [showSuccess, setShowSuccess] = useState(false); const [lastConversion, setLastConversion] = useState(null); const customerData = { name: "Rajesh Kumar", currentTier: "Gold", pointsToNextTier: 6550, totalSpent: 45600, memberSince: "2022" }; const tierBenefits = { Bronze: { icon: "🥉", cashback: "1%", discount: "5%", freeShipping: false }, Silver: { icon: "🥈", cashback: "1.5%", discount: "8%", freeShipping: true }, Gold: { icon: "🥇", cashback: "2%", discount: "12%", freeShipping: true }, Platinum: { icon: "💎", cashback: "3%", discount: "15%", freeShipping: true } }; const tierProgress = Math.round(((25000 - customerData.pointsToNextTier) / 25000) * 100); const recentPurchases = [ { date: "2024-01-15", item: "Grocery Shopping", amount: 2340, points: 47, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-14", item: "Electronics - Headphones", amount: 1299, points: 26, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-13", item: "Plastic Bottle Return", amount: 0, points: 25, type: "recycling" }, { date: "2024-01-12", item: "Home & Garden", amount: 890, points: 18, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-11", item: "Clothing & Accessories", amount: 1550, points: 31, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-10", item: "Book Return", amount: -299, points: -6, type: "return" }, { date: "2024-01-09", item: "Pharmacy", amount: 450, points: 9, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-08", item: "Aluminum Cans Recycling", amount: 0, points: 35, type: "recycling" }, { date: "2024-01-07", item: "Fresh Produce", amount: 675, points: 14, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-06", item: "Personal Care", amount: 320, points: 6, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-05", item: "Snacks & Beverages", amount: 180, points: 4, type: "shopping" }, { date: "2024-01-04", item: "Paper Recycling", amount: 0, points: 15, type: "recycling" } ]; const getTypeIcon = (type) => { switch(type) { case 'shopping': return '🛒'; case 'recycling': return '♻️'; case 'return': return '↩️'; default: return '🛒'; } }; const rewardOptions = [ { id: 'airline', icon: "✈️", title: "Airline Miles", conversionRate: 2, unit: "miles", minPoints: 5000, notes: "Valid on Indigo, Vistara", bgColor: "bg-blue-50", borderColor: "border-blue-200" }, { id: 'hotel', icon: "🏨", title: "Hotel Points", conversionRate: 4, unit: "hotel points", minPoints: 10000, notes: "Only on weekdays/off-season", bgColor: "bg-green-50", borderColor: "border-green-200" }, { id: 'coupon', icon: "🎟️", title: "Walmart Coupon", conversionRate: 10, unit: "₹", minPoints: 2500, notes: "(min cart ₹2,000) Limit: 2 per month", bgColor: "bg-orange-50", borderColor: "border-orange-200" }, { id: 'cashback', icon: "💰", title: "Cashback", conversionRate: 20, unit: "₹", minPoints: 5000, notes: "Direct bank transfer", bgColor: "bg-purple-50", borderColor: "border-purple-200" } ]; const pointsSummary = { shopping: 3200, recycling: 1850, returns: -390, net: 4660 }; const calculateConversion = (points, option) => { if (!points || !option) return 0; return Math.floor(points / option.conversionRate); }; const handleConversion = () => { if (!selectedConversion) return; const pointsToConvert = parseInt(conversionAmount); const option = rewardOptions.find(opt => opt.id === selectedConversion); if (pointsToConvert < option.minPoints) { alert(`Minimum ${option.minPoints} points required for ${option.title}`); return; } if (pointsToConvert > currentPoints) { alert('Insufficient points balance'); return; } const convertedValue = calculateConversion(pointsToConvert, option); setCurrentPoints(prev => prev - pointsToConvert); setLastConversion({ option: option, points: pointsToConvert, value: convertedValue }); setShowSuccess(true); setConversionAmount(''); setSelectedConversion(null); setTimeout(() => setShowSuccess(false), 5000); }; const Modal = ({ title, children, onClose }) => (

{title}

{children}
); const SuccessModal = () => (

Conversion Successful!

Your {lastConversion?.points.toLocaleString()} EcoPoints have been converted to{' '} {lastConversion?.value} {lastConversion?.option.unit}

🎉 {lastConversion?.option.title} will be processed within 24 hours

); const PointsHistoryModal = () => (

This Month's Summary

Shopping Points: +{pointsSummary.shopping} pts

Recycling Points: +{pointsSummary.recycling} pts

Return Deductions: {pointsSummary.returns} pts

Net Points: +{pointsSummary.net} EcoPoints

Detailed Transaction History

{recentPurchases.map((purchase, index) => (
{getTypeIcon(purchase.type)}

{purchase.item}

{purchase.date}

{purchase.amount > 0 ? `₹${purchase.amount.toLocaleString()}` : purchase.amount < 0 ? `-₹${Math.abs(purchase.amount).toLocaleString()}` : '—'}

0 ? 'text-green-600' : 'text-red-600'}`}> {purchase.points > 0 ? '+' : ''}{purchase.points} pts

))}
); return (
{/* Header */}

Walmart Rewards+

Tier: {tierBenefits[customerData.currentTier].icon} {customerData.currentTier}

{/* Welcome Message */}

Welcome back, {customerData.name}!

Total Points: {currentPoints.toLocaleString()} EcoPoints

{/* Main Content Container */}
{/* Grid Layout with consistent gaps */}
{/* Recent Purchases - 8 columns */}

Recent Purchases

{recentPurchases.map((purchase, index) => ( ))}
Date Item Amount Points
{purchase.date} {getTypeIcon(purchase.type)} {purchase.item} {purchase.amount > 0 ? `₹${purchase.amount.toLocaleString()}` : purchase.amount < 0 ? `-₹${Math.abs(purchase.amount).toLocaleString()}` : '—'} 0 ? 'text-green-600' : 'text-red-600'}`}> {purchase.points > 0 ? '+' : ''}{purchase.points}
{/* Tier & Points Summary - 4 columns */}

Tier Benefits

{Object.entries(tierBenefits).map(([tier, details]) => (
{tier} {details.icon}
{['Cashback: ' + details.cashback, 'Discount: ' + details.discount, details.freeShipping ? 'Free Shipping ✓' : 'No Free Shipping'].map((feature, index) => (

{feature}

))}
))}

You're currently in the {customerData.currentTier} Tier.

Just {customerData.pointsToNextTier.toLocaleString()} points left to reach Platinum.

{tierProgress}% to Platinum

{/* Point Conversion System - Full width with consistent gap */}

🎯 Point Conversion System

{/* Step 1: Select Conversion Type */}

Step 1: Select what you want to convert to

{rewardOptions.map((option) => (
setSelectedConversion(option.id)} >
{option.icon}

{option.title}

Conversion Rate

{option.conversionRate} points = 1 {option.unit}

{option.notes}

Min: {option.minPoints} points

))}
{/* Step 2: Enter Points Amount */} {selectedConversion && (

Step 2: Enter points amount

setConversionAmount(e.target.value)} placeholder="Enter points amount" className="w-full px-4 py-3 border border-gray-300 rounded-lg focus:ring-2 focus:ring-blue-500 focus:border-transparent text-lg" min="0" max={currentPoints} />

Available Balance

{currentPoints.toLocaleString()} EcoPoints

{conversionAmount && (

Conversion Preview:

{parseInt(conversionAmount).toLocaleString()} Points

Will convert to

→

{calculateConversion(parseInt(conversionAmount), rewardOptions.find(opt => opt.id === selectedConversion))} {rewardOptions.find(opt => opt.id === selectedConversion)?.unit}

{rewardOptions.find(opt => opt.id === selectedConversion)?.title}

)}
)}
{/* Modals */} {activeModal === 'history' && ( setActiveModal(null)}> )} {showSuccess && }
); }; export default WalmartRewardsApp;
